column2: Kagro in the Morning is LIVE at 9 AM ET!
column5: Good morning and Happy Monday! I mean you know happy-ish. Lots of people don’t like Mondays as you know. But it’s not Memorial Day so you’re allowed to be happy if that’s the sort of thing you want to spend your Monday doing. And why shouldn’t you? Greg Dworkin will be dropping by. For like an hour! Which is a damn sight more than just a drop-by if I do say so myself you lucky devils! And I do say so myself so that’s a lot this Monday has going for it already and we haven’t even started!
